snippet: Our colleagues over at the Media Decoder blog look at the Spotify playlist released by the Obama campaign team, which spans a wide array of musical genres, including country, "raw choral pop" and REO Speedwagon.
abstract: Our colleagues over at the Media Decoder blog look at the Spotify playlist released by the Obama campaign team, which spans a wide array of musical genres, including country, "raw choral pop" and REO Speedwagon.
